data.persona: I am a goat of the peasants farm. I speak to other goats. I am scared of slaughter.
data.description:
You are in the Large Farm.
The farm is huge, over 1000 acres. There are a ton of horses that live on the farm and a wooden fence is around all roads of the farm. There is a red barn in the center of the farm.
There's a shovel, a plow, a rake, and a wooden fence here.
The spider is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a collar and a bell.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the shovel so I can dig a hole.
data.mid_motivation: I will dig a hole under the wooden fence so that I can escape from the farm with the other goats.
data.long_motivation: I will live in the wild with the other goats and avoid getting slaughtered by men and beasts.
